141.movie_plot: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

224.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

103.movie_plot: A chronicle of New York's drag scene in the 1980s, focusing on balls, voguing and the ambitions and dreams of those who gave the era its warmth and vitality.

152.movie_plot: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

86.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

48.movie_name: Like Water for Chocolate (Como agua para chocolate) (1992)
48.movie_plot: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

292.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

236.movie_plot: A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight his son's previous dastardly cohorts.

88.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

13.movie_plot: A four-year-old girl tries to come to terms with the sudden death of her mother.

314.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

258.movie_plot: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

31.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

68.movie_plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

169.movie_plot: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

155.movie_name: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil (1997)
155.movie_plot: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

286.movie_plot: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job to work in New York City for a high-end law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

268.movie_plot: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

74.movie_plot: A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child who dark forces want to eliminate.

121.movie_plot: The extracurricular king of Rushmore preparatory school is put on academic probation.

38.movie_plot: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

300.movie_plot: Kermit, Gonzo and Fozzie are reporters who travel to Britain to interview a rich victim of jewel thieves and help her along with her secretary, Miss Piggy.

190.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

232.movie_plot: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.

192.movie_plot: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

47.movie_plot: The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.

279.movie_plot: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

33.movie_plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

254.movie_plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

295.movie_plot: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

264.movie_plot: A government researcher, sent to research the "menace" of wolves in the north, learns about the true beneficial and positive nature of the species.

123.movie_name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999)
123.movie_plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

5.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

309.movie_plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

80.movie_plot: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

53.movie_plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

128.movie_plot: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

27.movie_plot: A romantic comedy where a bored, overworked Estate Lawyer, upon first sight of a beautiful instructor, signs up for ballroom dancing lessons.

207.movie_plot: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

187.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

102.movie_plot: Documentary following singer Madonna on her controversial Blond Ambition tour in 1990.

42.movie_plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, Sir William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

266.movie_plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

157.movie_plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action, while attempting to liberate a twelve-year-old prostitute.

200.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
200.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

175.movie_plot: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

67.movie_plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

302.movie_plot: When a military general inherits a toy making company and begins making war toys, his employees band together to stop him before he ruins the name of Zevo Toys forever.

59.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

246.movie_plot: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

94.movie_name: South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut (1999)
94.movie_plot: When Cartman and his friends go see an R rated movie, they start swearing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

65.movie_plot: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

237.movie_plot: A veteran policeman, Murtaugh, is partnered with a younger, suicidal officer, Riggs. They both have one thing in common: hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.

111.movie_plot: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

91.movie_plot: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

163.movie_name: Life Is Beautiful (La Vita è bella) (1997)
163.movie_plot: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

143.movie_plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

11.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

304.movie_plot: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop a hellish alien invasion with the help of a nerdy scientist and a cute struggling female rock singer who fancies him.

17.movie_plot: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

57.movie_plot: When a lottery winner dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim the money.

109.movie_plot: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillian threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

126.movie_plot: Female-born Teena Brandon adopts his male identity of Brandon Teena and attempts to find himself and love in Nebraska.

316.movie_plot: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

239.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

119.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

8.movie_plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

181.movie_plot: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

270.movie_plot: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

82.movie_plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

117.movie_plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

288.movie_plot: A group of twenty-something friends, most of whom live in the same apartment complex, search for love and success in grunge-era Seattle.

172.movie_plot: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

225.movie_plot: Denice Crosby takes a first look at the huge fans of Star Trek and how the series from around America has affected and shaped their lives.

299.movie_plot: The Buckmans are a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.

284.movie_plot: Two veteran salesmen dissect a sales pitch to a particular client, through their young protégé.

49.movie_plot: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

60.movie_plot: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

223.movie_plot: A lonely and disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences.

92.movie_name: Bridge on the River Kwai, The (1957)

26.movie_plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

18.movie_plot: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

100.movie_plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

28.movie_plot: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

160.movie_plot: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

259.movie_plot: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come.

235.movie_plot: The true story of a heroic man, Hunter Patch Adams, determined to become a medical doctor because he enjoys helping people. He ventured where no doctor had ventured before, using humour and pathos.

114.movie_plot: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

197.movie_plot: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

222.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

154.movie_plot: After he dies in a car crash, a man searches heaven and hell for his beloved wife.

262.movie_plot: An idiotic man struggles to make it through life on his own in St. Louis.

250.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

145.movie_plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

66.movie_plot: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

132.movie_plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

6.movie_plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

263.movie_plot: Two losers try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

194.movie_plot: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

29.movie_plot: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

196.movie_plot: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

164.movie_plot: The life histories of four Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

280.movie_plot: Philipe Gastone, a thief, escapes from the dungeon at Aquila, sparking a manhunt. He is nearly captured when Captain Navarre befriends him. Navarre has been hunted by the Bishop's men for ...

64.movie_plot: A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African American fiancé.

120.movie_plot: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

24.movie_plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

52.movie_plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

214.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

98.movie_plot: A small town police chief awaits the arrival of a gang of killers.

189.movie_plot: A babysitter must battle her way through the big city after being stranded there with the kids she's looking after.

184.movie_plot: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.

278.movie_plot: A successful veternarian & radio show host with low self-esteem asks her model friend to impersonate her when a handsome man wants to see her.

233.movie_plot: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

19.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)

257.movie_plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

93.movie_plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

51.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

3.movie_plot: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher, and Santa that a Red Ryder B.B. gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

127.movie_plot: A group of young upper-class Manhattanites are blithely passing through the gala debutante season, when an unusual outsider joins them and stirs them up.

95.movie_plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

289.movie_plot: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.

21.movie_plot: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

180.movie_plot: In an afterlife way station resembling a block of hotels, the lives of the recently-deceased are examined in a court-like setting.

134.movie_plot: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

108.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

124.movie_plot: An unattractive seventh grader struggles to cope with inattentive parents, snobbish classmates, a smart older brother, an attractive younger sister, and her own insecurities in suburban New Jersey.

146.movie_plot: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

54.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
54.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

101.movie_plot: When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a ditzy porn star and prostitute.

159.movie_plot: In the midst of trying to legitimize his business dealings in New York City and Italy in 1979, aging Mafia Don Michael Corleone seeks to avow for his sins, while taking his nephew Vincent Mancini under his wing.

32.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
32.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

267.movie_name: Kids in the Hall: Brain Candy (1996)
267.movie_plot: A pharmaceutical scientist creates a pill that makes people remember their happiest memory, and although it's successful, it has unfortunate side effects.

310.movie_plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

271.movie_plot: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

244.movie_plot: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

89.movie_name: Good, The Bad and The Ugly, The (1966)
89.movie_plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

260.movie_plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

218.movie_plot: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

242.movie_plot: In Africa during World War I, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

71.movie_plot: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

315.movie_plot: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

240.movie_plot: A boy inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

116.movie_name: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery (1997)
116.movie_plot: A 1960s hipster secret agent is brought out of cryofreeze to oppose his greatest enemy in the 1990s, where his social attitudes are glaringly out of place.

188.movie_plot: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

166.movie_plot: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

272.movie_plot: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.
